name: Twitter SWE
description: Introduced Zipkin tracing to sample live SQL operations and save them for access in BigQuery
Developed scheduled job that finds how often each graph/partition are hit and the popular queries under each
Built dashboard for engineers to identify pain points and trends in partition/graph load

name: SuperUROP - Regulating Social Media
description: Developed a policy that can test and quantify the effect of content curation on user learning
Built a recommendation system using content filtering and matrix factorization algorithms
Created learning agents to track the effect of different recommending systems on decision making

name: Facebook SWE
description: Created internal tool to load B2C chat plugin for debugging and E2E + snapshot testing
Refactored existing web controller to use class-based evaluator for whitelisting and privacy rules
Updated the on boarding flow for the chat plugin to allow businesses to add and customize newly introduced features

name: TownSq
description: Constructed front end dashboard displaying average feedback, reviews, and payment churn for HOA managers toimprove resident experiences
Participated in Data Lab with AWS to develop data lake + warehouse for HOA resident feedback and payment metrics

name: HKN Algorithms Tutor
description: Mentored and taught 2 students each semester in Introduction to Algorithms and Data Structures 6.006. Topics included Master Theorem, Insertion + Selection + Merge + In Place Merge + Radix Sort, dynamic arrays, BSTs, AVLs, Heaps, Hash Maps, BFS, DFS, Dijkstras, Johnsons, Bellman Ford, Dynamic Programming, Subset Sum & Pseudo-polynomial, P, NP, Hardness, Completeness

name: Facebook University
description: Developed an Android application called Skillshop that allows users to post workshops they want to teach and theability to sign up for public workshops connecting them to teachers and other students in the class
